API%3A%20Aliases.html#/s:9ReCombine9Redu.name: ReducerFn
API%3A%20Aliases.html#/s:9ReCombine9Redu.abstract: A generic representation of a reducer function.

API%3A%20Aliases.html#/s:9ReCombine10Sel.name: SelectorFn
API%3A%20Aliases.html#/s:9ReCombine10Sel.abstract: A generic representation of a selector function.

Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.name: ofType(_:)
Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.abstract: Filter that includes only the Action type that is given, and maps to that specific Action type.

Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.name: ofTypes(_:_:)
Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.abstract: Filter that includes only the two Action types that are given.

Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.name: ofTypes(_:_:_:)
Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.abstract: Filter that includes only the three Action types that are given.

Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.name: ofTypes(_:_:_:_:)
Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.abstract: Filter that includes only the four Action types that are given.

Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.name: ofTypes(_:_:_:_:_:)
Extensions/AnyPublisher.html#/s:7Combine.abstract: Filter that includes only the five Action types that are given.

Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.name: eraseActionType()
Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.abstract: Wraps this publisher with a type eraser to return a generic Action protocol.

API%3A%20Memoized%20Selectors.html#/s:9R.name: createSelector(_:transformation:memoized:)
API%3A%20Memoized%20Selectors.html#/s:9R.abstract: Higher order function that creates a composable, optimized selector function. A selector function is a pure function used for obtaining slices of store state.

API%3A%20Reducer%20Composition%20Helpers.name: combineReducers(_:)
API%3A%20Reducer%20Composition%20Helpers.abstract: Combines multiple reducer functions into a single reducer function. Each reducer function must reduce the same type.

API%3A%20Reducer%20Composition%20Helpers.name: forKey(_:use:)
API%3A%20Reducer%20Composition%20Helpers.abstract: Convert a reducer function for a specific instance property into a reducer function for the entire instance.

Structs/Effect.html#/s:9ReCombine6Effect.name: dispatch
Structs/Effect.html#/s:9ReCombine6Effect.abstract: When true, the emitted actions from the source Action Publisher will be dispatched to the store. If false, the emitted actions will be ignored.

Structs/Effect.html#/s:9ReCombine6Effect.name: source
Structs/Effect.html#/s:9ReCombine6Effect.abstract: A closure with takes in an Action Publisher and returns an Action Publisher

Classes/Store.html#/s:9ReCombine5StoreC8.name: dispatch(action:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:9ReCombine5StoreC8.abstract: Dispatch Action to the Store. Calls reducer function with the passed action and previous state to generate a new state.

Classes/Store.html#/s:9ReCombine5StoreC6.name: select(_:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:9ReCombine5StoreC6.abstract: Returns derived data from the application state based on a given selector function.

Classes/Store.html#/s:9ReCombine5StoreC8.name: register(_:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:9ReCombine5StoreC8.abstract: Registers an effect that processes from when this function is called until the returned AnyCancellable instance in cancelled.

Classes/Store.html.name: Store
Classes/Store.html.abstract: Combine-based state management. Enables dispatching of actions, executing reducers, performing side-effects, and listening for the latest state.

Structs/Effect.html.name: Effect
Structs/Effect.html.abstract: Configures an Effect from a source function and a dispatch option.
